columns.name: allow_users_to_change_password
columns.description: Specifies whether IAM users are allowed to change their own password.

columns.name: expire_passwords
columns.description: Indicates whether passwords in the account expire. Returns true if MaxPasswordAge contains a value greater than 0. Returns false if MaxPasswordAge is 0 or not present.

columns.name: hard_expiry
columns.description: Specifies whether IAM users are prevented from setting a new password after.

columns.name: max_password_age
columns.description: The number of days that an IAM user password is valid.

columns.name: minimum_password_length
columns.description: Minimum length to require for IAM user passwords.

columns.name: password_reuse_prevention
columns.description: Specifies the number of previous passwords that IAM users are prevented from reusing.

columns.name: require_lowercase_characters
columns.description: Specifies whether to require lowercase characters for IAM user passwords.

columns.name: require_numbers
columns.description: Specifies whether to require numbers for IAM user passwords.

columns.name: require_symbols
columns.description: Specifies whether to require symbols for IAM user passwords.

columns.name: require_uppercase_characters
columns.description: Specifies whether to require uppercase characters for IAM user passwords.
